Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.security

Interface Summary
IAeAuthorizationProvider Interface for pluggable authorization providers
IAeLoginProvider Interface for pluggable login providers
IAePrincipal Extension of the java.security.Principal interface for principal implementations that a) do not implement Principal and/or b) support role checks directly .NET and Axis principals fall into both categories above
IAeSecurityProvider Security manager interface for Authentication and Authorization of service requests
 

Class Summary
AeCallbackHandler JAAS Callback handler that handles TextOutputCallback, NameCallback, PasswordCallback
AeJAASConfiguration Extension of the JAAS configuration that allows us to add an additional login module to the existing configuration.
AeJAASLoginProvider Login provider that uses a JAAS Login Context to authenticate user credentials
AePrincipalAuthProvider Authorization provider that checks if one of a subject's principals is in one of the configured allowed roles.
AeSecurityProvider Security provider that acesses login and authorization providers configured in the engine config
AeSimpleNamePrincipal Simple implementation of a principal that holds the name of a user, group or role
 

Exception Summary
AeSecurityException Extension of AeException for Security exceptions
